about_the_game:
FG Medieval Buildings Map Pack

The Medieval Buildings Map Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools. This art package consists of many premade classic medieval buildings along with many backgrounds, brushes, and fill images. This pack includes the following items:

  • 12 new background images and 3 premade maps
  • Brushes include stone walls, cobblestone roads, wooden platforms, and ruins
  • Decorations include 30 premade buildings, rocks, additional roof elements, tents, ruin elements, and more
  • Fills include several background elements such as cobblestones, grass, rocks as well as roof types
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Joshua Watmough
detailed_description:
FG Medieval Buildings Map Pack

The Medieval Buildings Map Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools. This art package consists of many premade classic medieval buildings along with many backgrounds, brushes, and fill images. This pack includes the following items:

  • 12 new background images and 3 premade maps
  • Brushes include stone walls, cobblestone roads, wooden platforms, and ruins
  • Decorations include 30 premade buildings, rocks, additional roof elements, tents, ruin elements, and more
  • Fills include several background elements such as cobblestones, grass, rocks as well as roof types
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Joshua Watmough

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
